definition: texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up

sentences.english: The barber looks around the shop and says, "About 2 hours."
sentences.chinese: 理髮室看了看四周，說，“大約兩個小時。”

sentences.english: The hairdresser opens a salon, the lawyer his or her own practice and so on.
sentences.chinese: 理髮師開一間髮型屋，律師重操舊業，等等。

sentences.english: There is this good ol' barber in some city in US.
sentences.chinese: 在美國某城，有個善良的老理髮師。

sentences.english: Now you're the inventor of the Suck Kut right?
sentences.chinese: 那，你是吸入式理髮器的發明人，對吧？

sentences.english: I went to barbershop and got a haircut specially.
sentences.chinese: 我特地到理髮店修整了髮型。

sentences.english: A barbershop in a lane The barber shop in the alley is convenient and cheap for neighbors so it is quite necessary.
sentences.chinese: 《衚衕理髮店》鄰里間的便民服務，廉價而不可或缺。

sentences.english: BEFORE the advent of male vanity, the local barbershop used to be a regaling hotspot.
sentences.chinese: 由於男性的虛榮心，當地的理髮館一直以來生意興隆。

sentences.english: Have the stylist dry your hair completely.
sentences.chinese: 讓理髮師把你的頭髮完全吹乾。

sentences.english: Here the local were always barbered at this hour on this day.
sentences.chinese: 原來本地人老是在這一天這個時候這個地方理髮。

sentences.english: This hairdresser designs this elegant and graceful hair-style.
sentences.chinese: 這種典雅大方的髮式出自這位理髮師之手。

sentences.english: Upon emerging, he refused to bathe and trimmed his hair and nails only once a year.
sentences.chinese: 他不洗澡，理髮和修指甲則是一年一次。

sentences.english: Our son came back from the barber's shop as bald as coot.
sentences.chinese: 我們的兒子從理髮店回來，頭髮剃得光光的。

sentences.english: Let's say that you're at a hair salon and you have very fine hair
sentences.chinese: 假設你正在一家理髮店，你的髮質非常的細。

sentences.english: Very well，and how would you like your haircut，sir？
The hairdresser is drying his hair with the hairdryer.
sentences.chinese: 理髮師在用吹風機給自己吹乾頭髮。

definition: master/qualified worker/respectful form of address for older men/CL:個|个[ge4],位[wei4],名[ming2]
to decorate/interior decoration/to fit up/to renovate
to open a door (lit. and fig.)/to open for business
